Room.Name: Gypsy King's Sleeping Quarters
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the bedroom of the king of the gypsys.
Room.LongDescription: The massive oak bed takes up most of the room, leaving little space for the clutter of strange items that have been gathered after years of travel in the Land of Mordor. A mechanical bird in a cage watches your every step as you move about the room. On a high shelf you can see a brass vial which gives off a sweet smelling vapor, contending with a pungent odor coming from a salve in a blood-red container marked "eternal youth."
